column6: Science fiction visionary Orson Scott Card (Ender's Game, Speaker for the Dead) and superstar artist Andy Kubert (1602, Origin, Ultimate X-Men) continue the origin of Ultimate Iron Man.  Tony Stark and Jim "Rhodey" Rhodes have their first adventure!  What happens here will change their lives!
column8: | writer:Orson Scott Card | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Richard Isanove | penciller (cover):Andy Kubert | inker:Danny K. Miki
